devdoc.author: Farm Signals
devdoc.details: A smart contract for managing agricultural forward contracts

ContractCreated(uint256,address,string,u.details: Emitted when a new forward contract is created

params.contractId: The unique identifier of the contract
params.crop: The type of crop in the contract
params.farmer: The address of the farmer who created the contract
params.pricePerKg: The price per kilogram of the crop

constructor.details: Constructor function called once on contract deployment

params._crop: The type of crop being contracted
params._deliveryDate: The timestamp when the crop should be delivered
params._pricePerKg: The price per kilogram in wei
params._quantity: The quantity of crop in kilograms

returns.contractId: The unique identifier of the created contract

getContract(uint256).details: Retrieves a forward contract by its ID

params._id: The unique identifier of the contract

devdoc.title: FarmContract

constructor.notice: Initializes the contract with contractCount starting at 0

userdoc.notice: This contract allows farmers to create forward contracts for their crops
